column2: "Wait, you're <%me>, right? The one who accepted my request? Thank you so much!"
"Before I tell you about the quest, do you mind if I ask you something?"
"On the planet Lillipa, have you seen any small shadows? Do you know where they are?"
"Oh, I'm sorry. I guess you haven't seen them."
"Sorry, it was a weird question. There have been a lot of sightings, but a specific location hasn't been pinned down yet."
"Oh, I completely forgot to introduce myself. I'm Fourier. I may not look it, but I'm an ARKS member too."
"Have you heard anything about the shadows on Lillipa? It's been quite the rumor lately."
"Would you believe me if I told you that I was saved by those little shadows?"
"I was heavily damaged and couldn't move, and that's when they saved me."
"I went through a lot, but I was finally able to make it back. I need to thank them for saving me."
"That's why I have just one request!"
"Can you look for the little shadows in my place?"
"I would really want to go myself too, but as you can see I'm not in any condition."
"It doesn't matter if you believe me or not. Either way, I'll pay you."
"I just want to confirm if it actually happened or not."
"Whenever you have the time, I'll be here!"
